Oh,Portal. What can I say about this little charm.

A short but entertaining game. I beat it in around a whole day. First valve game I ever beat. Yet a masterpiece. Its unique story and juiciness about what will happen next is amazing. Seeing how GlaDoS Turns good to evil is incredible. Plot twists,Puzzles,Slow paced,Fast Paced,Fights,Cubes,Companions,Curiousity,Cake...
Its an incredible game. How?
That would just ruin the experience.

Everyone has said what needs to be said.  This is essential PC gaming, if you haven't played it yet, why not?

This. Was. Amazing.
I know I'm like 10 years behind everyone else on playing this game but its good no matter what date it is. Almost everything is extremely well made: the story, UI, mechanics, and just the general idea; flawless. Well except one thing, it was too short. 18+5 missions with each mission being around one to ten minutes long. Thus, the replay time on this game is slightly limited. That doesn't mean that its a bad game; I wish i bought it earlier. 

So to lay it out flat,

Story 10/10
UI 10/10 (the ui was the crosshair thing; very simple and just how I like it)
Mechanics 9/10 (I had to adjust a lot on my mouse to get it the right sensitivity and some mission where a little glitchy)
Graphics 9/10
Replay Time ~8/10
Overall 9/10
Amazing game with an amazing story without a campaign that last too long.

This game is fantastic! A nice, confusing and enjoyable puzzle game with a little bit of that special Valve flare. This Firstperson, mind bending puzzler is always testing your mind. Getting from one point to another is no simple matter until you stop, look at your surroundings and, dare I say it, THINK! I definitly recommend this game if you enjoy puzzles, cause there is LOADS of them!

Excelente jogo, a única ressalva é o quão curta é a história, mas pelo menos é um jogo curto acompanhado de um preço curto, além de entrar em promoção frequentemente.

O texto é bem escrito, mordaz e divertido. O melhor seria jogar sem conhecer a história, embora seja difícil hoje em dia. Fico feliz por ter tido a sorte de não saber muito sobre antes de começar.

Geniale e visionario.

Bon, j'avais déjà eu l'occasion de faire ce jeu deux fois comme sa suite et je les ai acheté car vraiment ils en valent la peine même si j'ai pas l'impression que niveau rejouabilité ils soient bien placés.
Portal et Portal 2 sont excellents, si vous aimez les Puzzles achetez les les yeux fermés. Il faut noter que Portal se fini rapidement, le 2 est plus long. 
Pour ce qui est de l'histoire, dans le 1 rien n'est expliqué, le 2 est plus poussé dessus par contre et j'ai beaucoup accroché.
Si vous n'est pas Anglophobe, je recommande vivement d'y jouer avec les voix anglaises, j'ai été très déçu par la voix française de GlaDos.

I would say Poral was the most enjoyable gaming experince ever, but then I played Portal 2, which provides a much more indepth and engagaging extention of the Portal story.  It is best to play the games in order as the stories connect.

The one advantage that Portal one has over Portal 2 is that there is cake at the end of the testing.

FPS＋パズルという異色の組み合わせが特徴な作品。
ある実験室で目覚めた主人公が機会音声に誘導され、空間と空間を繋ぐポータルガンを使いパズルを解いていく「実験」をやらされる。
単なるパズルゲームではなく、主人公のいる施設の実態、物語の背景など様々なところまで力が入れられており、非常に印象に残る作品でした。
現在２が出ていますが、今作だけだと回収していない伏線が非常に多くモヤモヤが強く残ってしまうため、２まで続けてプレイすることをオススメ。

FPSパズルという新たな試みの実験的要素も強いためか、パズルの難易度や総ボリュームに関しては易しく少なめ。
しかしそれを補うストーリーの濃さがあり、また、同社作品のHalf-Life経験者にはニヤッと出来る設定があるため不満までは行かず。

とにかく機会音声主のGLaDOS様が凄く可愛いのでぜひ会いに行ってあげてください。

Portal stworzono jako semi-sequel dla darmowej gry Narbacular Drop, stworzonej jako testowy projekt przez studentów DigiPen Institute of Technology. Twórcy tej gry zostali zatrudnieni w Valve. tak w skrócie można przedstawić  historię powstania tej zacnej gry. Jest to gra logiczno-platformowa ukazana z perspektywy pierwszej osoby, wyprodukowana i wydana w 2007 roku przez Valve Corporation.
Historia gierki jest bardzo ciekawa : bohaterka gry, Chell budzi się w komorze relaksacyjnej jednego z pomieszczeń wielkiego kompleksu badawczego Aperture Science Enrichment Center. Po kilkunastu sekundach wita ją GLaDOS, sztuczna inteligencja sterująca kompleksem, i informuje, że ma przebyć serię testów. W jednej z początkowych komór testowych Chell otrzymuje urządzenie do tworzenia portali. Ostatni test ma się kończyć spaleniem testującego, jednak co było dalej to już nie chce zdradzać.
Jest to bardzo dobrze wykonana gra z pasją na wzór ekperymentu, który jest czołową marką firmy Valve.
Jak dla mnie gra zasługuje na ocenę 9/10. Piękno gry logicznej :)

Portal is one of the most amazing puzzle/fps games I have ever played.  You don't have any traditional weapons, but you do have a portal gun that creates a 2D tunnel through space.  Using only this, you are faced with a battery of tests that will force you to think out how to get from point A to point B without dying.  There are no health bars, only life and death.  No manipulation outside of the portal gun, and your own body weight.  Some puzzles will challenge your finess, timing, and patience, so I don't encourage players who have never played FPSes to start with this one.  The antoganist is also brutally rude, and makes really snyde comments on how terrible you are at the game to challenge your concentration, so be prepared to be insulted.  This game is one of the classics, and I encourage all FPS fans to give this one a shot.
Classic. Amazing. Mind Blowing.

Being something like of a first person puzzle game where you use portals in order to navigate around different levels and dangers. A lot of the actual gameplay comes from figuring out how to get across obstacles with nothing but using portals. But the most memorable aspect of this game is its great deadpan humor wherein a rouge A.I. known as GLaDOS that constantly mocks your progress as you run through mazes like some type of test rat.
I am not sure how the title pertains to the actual game.

Where to begin?  At first, my mind could not wrap around the portals.  I took the first couple levels, then understood the concepts and applying them.  Built upon strategies, and came to find this game to be a nice little gem.  Valve games at this point are all fun and unique, providing humor as well as wonderfully scripted storylines.  This game is up there with the Half-Life series, and takes place in the same world.  It's almost as if it's a Half-Life 3.
Just as awesome as I was expecting it to be, worth every second. Finished in one go :-D.

This game is just AMAZING! glaDOS is wity, and has a great personality!, incredibly smart level design, and even graphically this game keeps up with the rest of the games qualities! but as for the cons, it was WAAAY to short! like, I BEAT IT IN 5 HOURS! but overall:

+great soundtrack (what there was at least!)
+graphics
+gameplay
-length


8.5/10
